item.description:
Gardner After Hours

Starry Nights only: $12.00
(Students: $5.00)



  • Courtyard Music in the South Garden from 5-7pm
  • Self-Guided Museum Tour
  • Nature's Art: Star Gazing After Dark
  • Sketch in the Garden from 6-8pm




~ ~ ~


After Hours Plus
Total including Starry Nights: $23.00
(Students: $10.00)


This month, instead of Jazz, the the unique sound of bluegrass comes to the Gardner; banjos, fiddles, mandolins and more; played by the Berklee College of Music's new bluegrass program students.

A new kind of night out, Gardner After Hours is live music, art, conversation, cocktails and more in an inviting atmosphere. Linger around the courtyard bar, listen to live jazz or sample a new small plates menu in the caf√©.

Experience something different;
The Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum

Dress to impress.

What will you discover After Hours?

~ ~ ~
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have the group photo (the Renoir) pinned to my jacket.
item.name: Starry Nights: Music, Art, Conversation & Cocktails
